> Perceptor said "He should better be alright, I havent risked my sking for
> naught"
>
> After That he continued opening fire against the insectiods Alliens, Talon
> did the same


As Perceptor, Talon and Legacy continued firing on the insectoid
creatures, and as Tuscon continued to pick up the pace they are
quickly left behind as the group quickly covers the last of the
distance between them and where Rodimus has been kept.

They come to a vast chamber, one that makes all the others the group
has been through seem small. Nearly 250 feet across and high it was a
near perfect semi circular room all the way around. All around the
room, starting from 30 feet off the floor the walls were lined with
cave entrances, each of them perhaps five feet wide, hundreds of them
all around the room and stretching high towards the domed ceiling. At
floor level of the chamber there are several larger cave openings
which lead off in different directions much like the one that the
group was entering from.

In the center of the room a large column, stretching from floor to
ceiling and nearly 30 feet thick at the base. About 100 feet up there
appears to be some sort of small metal chamber that has been
haphazardly affixed to the column with some sort of adhesive. the
chamber is about 10 feet tall and perhaps 4 feet wide or so. Upon
closer inspection one could see that it is a recharging chamber, and
it is from inside this that Rodimus' signal can be detected.

However high up, near the top of that column near the ceiling is a
much larger version of the insectile creatures that you have seen. It
looks about identical to the others with four forelegs, each ending in
sharply barbed blades, eight legs that went along the side of the
body, and a scorpion like tail, although the abdomen is larger, and
overall it appeared to be 30 tall.

"Maximals, Autobots and Predacon" the creature said as it's wings
buzzed, the voice definitely sounded female. "Your companion has had
much to teach and is about to become a most delicious snack. But it is
good that you have come, you can become the main course!"

The creature spread her wings, dropped from her high perch and took
off to the air as she chuckled evilly.

(TAG)

Preston
